cleaned_text: and Clarify AHA Toner $25.00 Quantity: Ingredients: Aloe Vera Juice, fruit extract, Saccharum Officinarum (sugarcane) extract, Acer Saccharum (sugar maple) extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (orange) fruit extract, Citrus Limon (lemon) fruit extract, Organic Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) distillate, Lactobacillus Ferment Directions: Shake well before use. Apply to face with cotton after cleansing. Warning: In case of irritation, discontinue use and consult a doctor. For external use only.
